DOC.criteria: Patients spontaneous pain within 24 hour postoperatively The intensity pain : 4categorical assessment : `` Moderate pain '' `` Severe pain '' VAS assessment : 45.0 mm high Patients whose postoperative pain manage use oral NSAID A past history aspirininduced asthma A past ischemic heart disease , serious arrhythmia , congestive heart failure cerebrovascular disease Patients undergoes surgical procedure general anesthesia Patients take excluded medication
